entry_time.label: Bakeoff Entry Time (Seconds)
entry_time.tooltip: The amount of time during which users can enter a bakeoff

cook_time.label: Bakeoff Time (Seconds)
cook_time.tooltip: The amount of time that users can use to bake.

cooldown_time.label: Bakeoff Cooldown Time (Seconds)
cooldown_time.tooltip: The amount of time between the last bakeoff and the next bakeoff

steal_amount.label: Steal Amount (Donuts)
steal_amount.tooltip: The amount of donuts that will be stolen from a user

steal_chance.label: Steal Chance (%)
steal_chance.tooltip: The chance that a user successfully steals donuts from another participating user

steal_max_count.label: Steal Count
steal_max_count.tooltip: The amount of times that users can steal from other users in any given bakeoff.

sabotage_amount.label: Sabotage Amount (Donuts)
sabotage_amount.tooltip: The amount of donuts that the user will lose if the sabotage is successful

sabotage_chance.label: Sabotage Chance (%)
sabotage_chance.tooltip: The chance for a user to successfully sabotages another user

sabotage_max_count.label: Sabotage Count
sabotage_max_count.tooltip: The amount of times that users can sabotage other users in any given bakeoff.

anomoly_chance.label: Anomoly Chance (%)
anomoly_chance.tooltip: The chance for an anomoly to occure every tick.

anomoly_chance_breakdown.label: Breakdown Chance (%)
anomoly_chance_breakdown.tooltip: The chance for an anomoly to be of type 'Breakdown'

anomoly_chance_flop.label: Flop Chance (%)
anomoly_chance_flop.tooltip: The chance for an anomoly to be of type 'Flop'

anomoly_chance_flop_lower_bound.label: Flop - Lower Bound (%)
anomoly_chance_flop_lower_bound.tooltip: The smallest amount of donuts, in percentages, that the user could lose due to a flop

anomoly_chance_flop_upper_bound.label: Flop - Upper Bound (%)
anomoly_chance_flop_upper_bound.tooltip: The largest amount of donuts, in percentages, that the user could lose due to a flop

anomoly_chance_oven_fail.label: Oven Fail Chance (%)
anomoly_chance_oven_fail.tooltip: The chance for an anomoly to be of type 'Oven Fail'

anomoly_chance_oven_fail_lower_bound.label: Oven Fail - Lower Bound (%)
anomoly_chance_oven_fail_lower_bound.tooltip: The smallest amount of donuts, in percentages, that the user could lose due to a oven fail

anomoly_chance_oven_fail_upper_bound.label: Oven Fail - Upper Bound (%)
anomoly_chance_oven_fail_upper_bound.tooltip: The largest amount of donuts, in percentages, that the user could lose due to a oven fail

first_place_multiplier.label: First Place Payout Multiplier
first_place_multiplier.tooltip: The amount of payout that the user will get due to getting 1st place in the bakeoff

second_place_multiplier.label: Second Place Payout Multiplier
second_place_multiplier.tooltip: The amount of payout that the user will get due to getting 2nd place in the bakeoff

third_place_multiplier.label: Third Place Payout Multiplier
third_place_multiplier.tooltip: The amount of payout that the user will get due to getting 3rd place in the bakeoff

general_multiplier.label: General Place Payout Multiplier
general_multiplier.tooltip: The amount of payout that the user will get due to not placing in the bakeoff

tick_refresh_rate.label: Tick function refresh rate (seconds)
tick_refresh_rate.tooltip: Set this higher to ease burden of heist on CPU, lower increases CPU burden but faster response time.
